rows.label: tlk46320172_02_msg0001
rows.name:
To think I will never again hear
Fan-sama's beautiful singing voice...

rows.label: tlk46320172_02_msg0002
rows.name:
Sometimes at night, I would hear
her singing to herself, all alone.

rows.label: tlk46320172_02_msg0003
rows.name:
They say her voice has the power to
restrain the power of Blades, but in my
case it brought tranquility to my heart...

rows.label: tlk46320172_02_msg0004
rows.name:
Oh, but I shouldn't get
distracted while I'm on guard
duty! Excuse me, please.
